Infobox Congressman name=Larry Winn image name=Larry Winn.jpeg state=[[Kansas]] district=[[Kansas's 3rd congressional district|3rd]] party=[[United States Republican Party|Republican Party]] term_start=January 3, 1967 term_end=January 3, 1985 preceded=[[Robert Fred Ellsworth]] succeeded=[[Jan Meyers]] birth_date=birth date and age19190822 birth_place=[[Kansas City, Missouri]], U.S. death_date= death_place=
'''Edward Lawrence Winn, Jr.''' (born August 22, 1919) is a [[United States|U.S.]] [[Republican Party (United States)|Republican]] [[politician]].
He was born in [[Kansas City, Missouri]]. He was elected as a Republican to the [[United States House of Representatives]] from [[Kansas]] and served from January 3, 1967 to January 3, 1985. He currently resides in [[Prairie Village, Kansas]].
